Name: Meandering Fiend
About the game: Each maze you enter will have you scratching your head on which direction to go. Every maze has hidden objects to collect, or you can just find the exit and go to the next one. There are small Easter eggs hidden throughout the levels. Use the WASD, a controller, or mouse clicks to navigate the different mazes Future updates will include bigger mazes with puzzle elements to solve with more achievements.
